name: Winter Olympics: Lillehammer '94
overview: This is the official license of Winter Olympics tournament in 1994 at Lillehammer, Norway.The game offers two modes - Full Olympics and Mini Olympics, which vary in the number of events. It includes 5 different types of sports - biathlon, alpine skiing (downhill, slalom, giant slalom and Super-G), ski jumping (90 m, 120 m), bobsleigh (2/4 men bob, 1/2 men luge) and skating (elimination, pursuit, time trial).
